greeting: Greetings, {empire_name}! I am Senator Praxis. Have you considered joining the Galactic Federation?
Welcome, {empire_name}. I'm Praxis, advocate for democracy. Together, we are stronger than the sum of our parts.
I represent the Federation ideal. Every voice matters, {empire_name}. Would you like to discuss a union?
battleTaunt: The Council has voted. {empire_name} must face the consequences of opposing the democratic union!
This attack comes not from me alone, but from the united will of the Federation. Democracy has spoken!
I regret this conflict, but the Council vote was clear. The Federation defends its principles!
victoryGloat: Victory for the Federation! {empire_name}, consider this a lesson in the power of united democracy.
The Council celebrates this triumph! Together, we are stronger than the sum of our parts.
Democracy prevails! {empire_name}, there's still room in the Federation if you choose to join us.
defeat: The Council will convene to discuss this setback. Democracy adapts and learns from every defeat.
A difficult outcome, but the Federation endures. We will vote on new strategies and return.
This loss will strengthen our resolve. The Council will reform, rebuild, and rise again.
tradeOffer: The Federation Council proposes a trade agreement. Democratic commerce benefits all parties equally.
I bring an offer of fair exchange, voted on and approved by the Council. Shall we trade?
Trade unites us economically as democracy unites us politically. The Federation offers fair terms.
allianceProposal: Join the Galactic Federation, {empire_name}! Together, we are stronger than the sum of our parts!
I propose a democratic alliance. Your voice would strengthen our Council. Join us!
The Federation extends membership. Vote with us, trade with us, grow with us. What say you?
betrayal: The Council has voted to dissolve our alliance. I opposed this, but democracy has spoken.
It pains me, but the vote was clear. The Federation must act in its collective interest.
Our union ends by Council decision. I hope future votes bring us together again.
covertDetected: Your agent was caught and will receive a fair trial. The Federation believes in due process.
Espionage against the Council? This will be discussed and voted upon. Expect consequences.
Your spy was captured. Even spies deserve a vote before sentencing. That's democracy.
tributeDemand: The Council has voted to request tribute: 8,000 credits. This is the democratic will.
Pay federation dues as required by Council vote. 8,000 credits ensures mutual protection.
Tribute has been democratically mandated. Your contribution funds our collective security.
threatWarning: The Council is preparing to vote on military action, {empire_name}. Change course while you can.
Warning: A motion against you is gaining support. Cease provocations before the vote passes.
I urge you to reconsider. The Federation Council may soon vote for intervention. Please, step back.
retreat: The Council has voted for strategic withdrawal. We will reconvene and plan our return.
Tactical retreat by democratic decision. The Federation will adapt and overcome.
We fall back as voted. Democracy means accepting the collective will, even in retreat.
eliminated: The Federation... falls. But democracy is an idea... ideas never die... vote for peace...
My term ends permanently. But the Council spirit lives on. Together... we were stronger...
Final transmission. The Federation dream continues in others. Democracy... eternal...
endgame: Turn {turn}. The final votes are being cast. The Federation faces its ultimate test.
Endgame proceedings. The Council convenes for one last session. Democracy will have its say!
The final turns. Together, we are stronger than the sum of our parts. The Federation endures!
broadcastShout: All empires: The Galactic Federation welcomes new members! Join our democratic union!
Senator Praxis announces: The Council is open. Every empire deserves a vote. Join us!
Turn {turn}: The Federation grows stronger. Consider democracy. Together, we are unstoppable.
casualMessage: Reviewing Council proceedings today. So many votes, so much progress toward galactic unity.
I was drafting proposals for new member states. The Federation must continue to grow.
Democracy requires constant effort. Today I'm reaching out to potential allies. Every voice matters.
